Settings.description: A list of settings for remote image providers. Here you define your url prefixes, and which domains are allowed to fetch images from.

FallbackMaxAge.description: Fallback max age for the image. If the server does not return a cache-control header, this value is used.

Prefix.description: The local path to prefix all remote image requests with. Eg. /remote makes eg. /remote/https://test.com/test.png pass through this provider.

RemoteUrlPrefix.description: (Optional) Prefix the url on the server, eg. set this to https://test.com/, and /remote/test.png will download https://test.com/test.png

Timeout.description: Timeout for a request in milliseconds

UserAgent.description: Sets a useragent value for the request. Useful for social networks. See http://www.useragentstring.com/ for available values.

HttpClientName.description: Sets the name of the HttpClient to use when downloading images.

AllowedDomains.description: Sets allowable domains to process images from.

AllowedDomainsRegex.description: Sets allowable domains to process images from.

AllowAllDomains.description: Allows all domains to be processed.

VerifyUrl.description: Verify that the input url returns a succesful status code.
